item.description:
My son (12 years) has watched me do VFX work from home for half his life - drawing roto shapes, keying green screens, etc. Yet he still has no real grasp of what’s involved.

If someone who’s literally watched it happen doesn’t get it, what must laypeople think moviemaking is like?
Off to see Fantastic Four. I havenâ€™t seen or read any reviews yet. Only watched the trailer and that looked very promising. I hope it is good.
